GET /api.description: This is a JSON representation of all the /endpoints associated with this api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

articles.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object corresponding to article_id

exampleResponse.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an updated article object corresponding to article_id that has an altered vote property

exampleResponse.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments objects corresponding to article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a new comment object corresponding to article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes a comment object corresponding to comment_id
